author: mmusich
body:
resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/41079

#### PR description:

Title says it all.

#### PR validation:

In CMSSW_13_1_X_2023-03-16-2300, `scram b runtests_GCPall` runs fine.

title: fix ASAN Segmentation failure & heap-buffer-overflow in unit test `Alignment/OfflineValidation/GCPall`
